title: IBM Design Language
reflection: The precision and scalability of IBM's design system taught me the importance of consistency at scale.
details: IBM's 8-bar logo and grid-based layouts influenced modern digital design principles.

title: NASA Graphics Standards Manual
reflection: NASA's manual showed how technical constraints can inspire creative solutions.
details: The worm logo and modular design system for space program materials.

title: British Rail Corporate Identity
reflection: The bold simplicity of British Rail's identity proved that less can be more impactful.
details: Margaret Calvert's typeface and double-arrow symbol revolutionized transit design.

title: Studio Sutherland Letterpress
reflection: The tactile quality of letterpress reminded me that craft lives in the details.
details: Hand-set type and traditional printing techniques for modern applications.

title: Eames Institute Launch Kit
reflection: The Eames' approach to education through design objects inspired my teaching philosophy.
details: Modular furniture and educational tools that blend form and function.

title: Indiana University
reflection: IU's comprehensive brand system demonstrates how institutions can maintain identity while allowing flexibility.
details: The IU trident logo and comprehensive color palette create a cohesive yet adaptable identity system.

title: Folklorious
reflection: Folklorious demonstrates how eclectic design can create a distinctive brand identity.
details: Barcelona-based accessories boutique blending classic artwork, illustration, and modern graphics.

title: EAT MY SHORTS!
reflection: Bold, gender-neutral design challenges traditional fashion branding conventions.
details: Independent clothing line with contemporary identity and innovative pastel metallic packaging.

title: Zonzo Estate
reflection: Versatile logo design that adapts to different contexts while maintaining brand recognition.
details: Australian winery rebrand featuring a floating-letter logo that transforms from classic to youthful.

title: Qoñi
reflection: Authentic branding that honors cultural heritage while creating modern appeal.
details: Peruvian artisan community specializing in hand-knitted alpaca goods with warmth-focused branding.

title: Lune Croissanterie
reflection: Futuristic design transforms traditional bakery into something extraordinary.
details: Melbourne bakery with galactic spaceship theme combining science and baked goods.

title: Tenth Muse Botanical Fragrance
reflection: Victorian-inspired design maintains modern relevance through clarity and beauty.
details: Botanical fragrance brand with Victorian aesthetic that balances intrigue and clarity.

title: Bombay Electric
reflection: Intense color gradients create vibrant, memorable brand identity.
details: Mumbai fashion select store with kaleidoscopic branding featuring intense color gradients.

title: Glorioso Super Nutrients
reflection: Simple, whimsical packaging inspired by seed packets creates distinctive brand identity.
details: Spanish superfood company with seed packet-inspired packaging featuring abstract circle motifs.

title: Felony Case
reflection: Dark luxury aesthetic transforms tech accessories into premium products.
details: New York tech accessories brand with black-on-black minimalism and subtle gold accents.

title: Yellow Owl Workshop
reflection: Whimsical design creates magical brand experience for craft products.
details: San Francisco woman-run craft business with quirky, whimsical designs exuding unicorn magic.
